alert.note: Alert for Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:00PM CDT until May 06 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Western Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Norden to 13 miles west of Johnstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Springview, Johnstown, Norden, Wood Lake, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Antelope Peak, Meadville and North River Trail. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 194 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 214 and 247. Highway 12 between mile markers 24 and 60. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
